subject: UEFA European Football Championship
Soccer
lead_paragraph: It seemed particularly perverse that Portugal should go out of the European Championship without Cristiano Ronaldo, its best finisher by far, not even stepping up to take one of the penalty kicks.
snippet: It seemed particularly perverse that Portugal should go out of the European Championship without Cristiano Ronaldo, its best finisher by far, not even stepping up to take one of the penalty kicks.
